acolyte.jdbc

Interface StatementHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCompositeHandler, CompositeHandler

    public interface StatementHandler
    Statement handler: allow to process statement by 'hand' and return.
    Author:
    Cedric Chantepie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  StatementHandler.Parameter
      Meaningful, user-friendly and immutable type alias for ugly Pair<ParameterDef,Object>.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isQuery(String sql)
      If statement is neither a PreparedStatement nor a CallbableStatement, determines whether given |sql| is a query.
      QueryResult whenSQLQuery(String sql, List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
      When given |sql| query is executed against Acolyte connection ...
      UpdateResult whenSQLUpdate(String sql, List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
      When given |sql| update is executed against Acolyte connection ...

    • Method Detail

      • whenSQLQuery

        QueryResult whenSQLQuery(String sql,
                         List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
                  throws SQLException
        When given |sql| query is executed against Acolyte connection ...
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query (with '?' for prepared/callable statement)
        parameters - Parameters (or empty map if none)
        Returns:
        Query result set
        Throws:
        SQLException - if fails to handle the specified query

      • whenSQLUpdate

        UpdateResult whenSQLUpdate(String sql,
                           List<StatementHandler.Parameter> parameters)
                    throws SQLException
        When given |sql| update is executed against Acolyte connection ...
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL query (with '?' for prepared/callable statement)
        parameters - Parameters (or empty map if none)
        Returns:
        Update result
        Throws:
        SQLException - if fails to handle the specified update

      • isQuery

        boolean isQuery(String sql)
        If statement is neither a PreparedStatement nor a CallbableStatement, determines whether given |sql| is a query. If returns true, whenSQLQuery will be called.
        Parameters:
        sql - the SQL statement to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the given SQL statement is a query, or false
